# enableable interface

> **来源**: https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/verse-api/versedotorg/verse/enableable
> **爬取时间**: 2025-12-27T01:31:35.027279

---

Implemented by classes whose instances can be enabled and disabled.

|  |  |
| --- | --- |
| Verse `using` statement | `using { /Verse.org/Verse }` |

## Members

This interface has functions, but no data members.

### Functions

| Function Name | Description |
| --- | --- |
| [`Enable`](/documentation/en-us/fortnite/verse-api/versedotorg/verse/enableable/enable) | Enable this object. |
| [`Disable`](/documentation/en-us/fortnite/verse-api/versedotorg/verse/enableable/disable) | Disable this object. |
| [`IsEnabled`](/documentation/en-us/fortnite/verse-api/versedotorg/verse/enableable/isenabled) | Succeeds if the object is enabled, fails if it’s disabled. |
